original_text: For he is our God; and we are the people of his pasture, and the sheep of his hand. To day if ye will hear his voice,
korean_text: 그는 우리의 하나님이시요 우리는 그가 기르시는 백성이며 그의 손이 돌보시는 양이기 때문이라 너희가 오늘 그의 음성을 듣거든

sentences.original_text: and we are the people of his pasture
and the sheep of his hand
To day if ye will hear his voice
